Functions

TripleDESKey

public function TripleDESKey(key: ByteArray)

This supports 2TDES and 3TDES.  If the key passed is 128 bits, 2TDES is used.  If the key has 192 bits, 3TDES is used.  Other key lengths give “undefined” results.
